Register(){const[inputs,setInputs]=useState({name:"",email:"",password:""});const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const baseUrl=Helpers.apiUrl;const emailPattern=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;if(!emailPattern.test(inputs.email)){Helpers.toast("error","Invalid email format.");return false;}else
